replies.msg:
超緊急,關於Upper-level set同 convext set

一個muti-variable concave function 有以下既定義:
f((1−λ)x + λx') ≥ (1−λ)f(x) + λf(x')
所以 Function ≥ Line segment

但係以我所知
Concave function有Upper level Convex set
即係我係個 convex set 畫條線,理論上條線係function之上
咁點解唔係 Line segment ≥ Function?

超緊急,關於Upper-level set同 convext set

一個muti-variable concave function 有以下既定義:
f((1−λ)x + λx') ≥ (1−λ)f(x) + λf(x')
所以 Function ≥ Line segment

但係以我所知
Concave function有Upper level Convex set
即係我係個 convex set 畫條線,理論上條線係function之上
咁點解唔係 Line segment ≥ Function?


右手邊個圖錯
你vertical axis係plot緊function value
但估你條convex curve係講緊two goods的indifference curve

一個muti-variable concave function 有以下既定義:
f((1−λ)x + λx') ≥ (1−λ)f(x) + λf(x')
所以 Function ≥ Line segment

但係以我所知
Concave function有Upper level Convex set
即係我係個 convex set 畫條線,理論上條線係function之上
咁點解唔係 Line segment ≥ Function?


右手邊個圖錯
你vertical axis係plot緊function value
但估你條convex curve係講緊two goods的indifference curve


即係我用level curve係唔可以畫到個line segment/個definition出黎?
要畫就畫3d?

超緊急,關於Upper-level set同 convext set

一個muti-variable concave function 有以下既定義:
f((1−λ)x + λx') ≥ (1−λ)f(x) + λf(x')
所以 Function ≥ Line segment

但係以我所知
Concave function有Upper level Convex set
即係我係個 convex set 畫條線,理論上條線係function之上
咁點解唔係 Line segment ≥ Function?


右手邊個圖錯
你vertical axis係plot緊function value
但估你條convex curve係講緊two goods的indifference curve


即係我用level curve係唔可以畫到個line segment/個definition出黎?
要畫就畫3d?

Yes. Upper level set 定義係
ucs(x0) = {x in R^n| f(x)>= f(x0)}
留意係describe緊x 個space, 唔係function value
例如single variable左邊圖個case, x0 的upper level set係
usc(x0) = [x0, oo), 個set係convex
當右邊個圖係single variable, 咁usc(x0) = (-oo,x0], 個set都係convex

超緊急,關於Upper-level set同 convext set

一個muti-variable concave function 有以下既定義:
f((1−λ)x + λx') ≥ (1−λ)f(x) + λf(x')
所以 Function ≥ Line segment

但係以我所知
Concave function有Upper level Convex set
即係我係個 convex set 畫條線,理論上條線係function之上
咁點解唔係 Line segment ≥ Function?


右手邊個圖錯
你vertical axis係plot緊function value
但估你條convex curve係講緊two goods的indifference curve


即係我用level curve係唔可以畫到個line segment/個definition出黎?
要畫就畫3d?

Yes. Upper level set 定義係
ucs(x0) = {x in R^n| f(x)>= f(x0)}
留意係describe緊x 個space, 唔係function value
例如single variable左邊圖個case, x0 的upper level set係
usc(x0) = [x0, oo), 個set係convex
當右邊個圖係single variable, 咁usc(x0) = (-oo,x0], 個set都係convex

容我問多少少野,怕搞錯
usc(x0) = [x0, oo), 個set係convex
你意思係唔係個convex set係a+b+c+d+e
唔該晒先

超緊急,關於Upper-level set同 convext set

一個muti-variable concave function 有以下既定義:
f((1−λ)x + λx') ≥ (1−λ)f(x) + λf(x')
所以 Function ≥ Line segment

但係以我所知
Concave function有Upper level Convex set
即係我係個 convex set 畫條線,理論上條線係function之上
咁點解唔係 Line segment ≥ Function?


右手邊個圖錯
你vertical axis係plot緊function value
但估你條convex curve係講緊two goods的indifference curve


即係我用level curve係唔可以畫到個line segment/個definition出黎?
要畫就畫3d?

Yes. Upper level set 定義係
ucs(x0) = {x in R^n| f(x)>= f(x0)}
留意係describe緊x 個space, 唔係function value
例如single variable左邊圖個case, x0 的upper level set係
usc(x0) = [x0, oo), 個set係convex
當右邊個圖係single variable, 咁usc(x0) = (-oo,x0], 個set都係convex

容我問多少少野,怕搞錯
usc(x0) = [x0, oo), 個set係convex
你意思係唔係個convex set係a+b+c+d+e
唔該晒先

no, 你a, b, c, d, e係描述緊set of point (x,f(x))
ucs(x0) = {x in R^n| f(x)>= f(x0)} <--- 呢個只係講緊set of x, 唔包括function value, 只係一個x係咪係個set ucs(x0) 入面係由function value 決定

definition for convex set 係 由個set 任取兩點x, y, 佢地的convex combination ax+(1-a)y 都係係個set 入面。
Concave function 的 upper level set 一定係convex, 因為
for any x0, take any x and y in ucs(x0), by definition, f(x)>=f(x0) and f(y)>=f(x0). Now by the concavity of f, f(ax+(1-a)y)>=af(x)+(1-a)f(y)>=f(x0). Thus, ax+(1-a)y is in ucs(x0).

no, 你a, b, c, d, e係描述緊set of point (x,f(x))
ucs(x0) = {x in R^n| f(x)>= f(x0)} <--- 呢個只係講緊set of x, 唔包括function value, 只係一個x係咪係個set ucs(x0) 入面係由function value 決定

definition for convex set 係 由個set 任取兩點x, y, 佢地的convex combination ax+(1-a)y 都係係個set 入面。
Concave function 的 upper level set 一定係convex, 因為
for any x0, take any x and y in ucs(x0), by definition, f(x)>=f(x0) and f(y)>=f(x0). Now by the concavity of f, f(ax+(1-a)y)>=af(x)+(1-a)f(y)>=f(x0). Thus, ax+(1-a)y is in ucs(x0).


明第一段明唔到第二段
都係了解唔到點解Convex set 同 upper level set係相反(Greater同Smaller)

而家去考Final
考完番黎可唔可以再問下你
